name: GameNoThinkingNoThoughtsChallenge
description: Challenge: No Thoughts: A 7 Hour Game Project Made With Running Fragmented Thoughts On The Challenge Of Building A Game With Schizophrenia, Psychopathy Impaired Opinionation, any communicative or rushed mental challenge, was placed into severe stress symptomatic behavior of blanking memory, impulsive reactive creation within turmoil of chaos, and a rage to in-coherency to understand decisive thoughts, making this master piece creation as is, placing an object in level design if Mistaken, cannot be removed, describing the forward energy of Psychological Movement.  3 Level Red Army Germans Vs Soviets.
